title: Aurelion Sol feels like wisp from DOTA
body:
But without the ability to support his team mates at all -_-

Personal opinion:
I think he may be the WEAKEST champion release we will have ever had in league, even worse than Aatrox. He will be WAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY too difficult for most people to play.

Also he is AP so like

Prepare for the  {{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:91}} 

With the {{item:3155}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3111}} 

Incoming 20% winrate.
